title: "Warning as rise of artificial intelligence 'makes it harder to spot scams'"
excerpt: "Scots have been warned that the rise of ChatGPT and other artificial intelligence is making scams harder to spot. Advice Direct Scotland said AI is now playing a “major part” in the ways scammers target people – with schemes becoming more sophisticated and difficult to detect."
